component.name: Exodus
component.summary: All-in-one app to secure, manage, and exchange blockchain assets

description.p: CONTROL YOUR KEYS: Exodus encrypts private keys and transaction data locally for your eyes only. Your data remains private - no account setup required.
BEAUTIFUL LIVE CHARTS: Track the value of your blockchain asset portfolio, in real time, as market conditions change.
PERSONALIZED FOR YOU: Like darker themes? How about a subtle space background? Exodus gives you a personal look with everything from traditional gray to patterns or customized themes.
